issue.subject: Add a descriptive field about pricing in SHOP
issue.description:
We'd like to add a descriptive field in pricing configuration of a diffusion. Some providers have exceptions, special documents of pricing conditions to link, or billing system details to add with the pricing of their products. EasySDI does not support any 'free text' field in the pricing definition of a diffusion, we'd like to add that. The new filed would be visible in the diffusion view, be optional, and only visible if the pricing is enabled on the platform. The text value would be added in the extended pricing metadata and be usable via XSLT (extending #1294). 

   
      
         
      
      
         
      
      
      Les frais sont facturés 10 jours après livraison, toute réclamation doit se faire sous 15 jours à contentieux@provider.tld
Mockup: !new_pricing_detail_field.png! Note that the status field would be moved, to keep the pricing fields together.

custom_fields.name: Functional impact
custom_fields.value: Providers can add remarks and special conditions on product pricing.

custom_fields.name: Ergonomic impact
custom_fields.value:
Added optional field in diffusion view.
Only affect platforms using ricing in shop.
